Articles.Content:
After apparently another gaming community literally having a rule against pony posts, i figured the KSP community would be a better option, so, hello everypony. Lets have Pony talk and stuff. Community or show whichever you please!

(Please no Spamming, Trolling, Graphic content such as cupcakes or smile hd, Princess Molestia, and please no hating, the title makes it pretty clear what it is, so if you hate, just scroll down and look at something else) That is all.

Please see this post by Ted, which is stickied for the Other Forums

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34328-Regarding-Fan-Threads

This thread is closed.
